title: "preteklosti" - Garamond italic-like
content:
If anyone can help, I haven’t been able to ID the following font, which looks a lot like some versions of Garamond (Garamond No 5, for example) with a slightly funkier “k”.

Any idea? Thanks in advance.  
Ben

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013102829im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/preteklosti_4102.jpg)

| --- | --- |

author: goglu

comments.content:
Thanks **akira**! Not 100% identical but close enough for my needs :-)  
Comparison below: Monotype Garamond italic, horizontally scaled to 80%.
